title: Daniel's Pride
description: Curse of the Griffin is a coming of age saga about a boy who is about to become a man - or something else.Meet Daniel, a young, starving artist living in a bloodsucking town. In this first book of a trilogy, the "unturned" (not yet one of "them") Daniel accepts an invitation to a party held by vampires for a chance to meet his first crush, Jessica Winters. But she is way out of his league, and it isn't long before he gets caught up in a rebel uprising against the vampires. It will take nothing short of pure magic to save him.
author: Jerome Walford
